item.title: Adding Async Streaming to Postgres Foreign Data Wrappers
item.description: üöÄ Supabase Wrappers is enhancing Postgres Foreign Data Wrappers (FDWs) by introducing asynchronous streaming! This update allows more efficient, memory-safe queries for large analytical workloads. Traditionally, FDWs operated synchronously, fetching all results or fixed-size batches, which could block the Postgres backend. With this new approach, users can expect improved performance in querying external databases. #Postgres #DataStreaming #Supabase #ForeignDataWrappers #DatabasePerformance

item.title: Introducing Analytics Buckets
item.description: üöÄ Supabase has launched Analytics Buckets to enhance data storage for analytical workloads. These specialized storage options are built on Apache Iceberg and Amazon S3, using columnar Parquet format. They are designed for efficient data scans, aggregations, and time-series queries. Analytics Buckets enable cost-effective storage, offering savings of 30-90% compared to traditional database storage. They also support open table formats and allow for schema evolution without data rewriting….

Discover how separating OLTP and OLAP can improve data analytics performance! #SupabaseETL #DataAnalytics #OpenSource #BigQuery #Postgres
